initial_reviews.review_title: Simplest and Clean solution to Digital Marketing
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about PowerAddon?
With a variety of features like configuring marketing emails, SMS, QR code configured into just one ONE platform which is fully integrated with Microsoft Dynamics CRM, power addon is one of the best digital marketing tool.
Inbuilt checks like emails preview on a wide variety of devices and platforms, spam filter check, etc., work like a charm.
The reporting feature, which is available with each module, whether its email or SMS, is outstanding. It gives very granular details (wrt to each user) about the campaign, and the report is dynamic and can be pulled any time + most of the commonly and frequently used reports are already built in.
Custom reports are also possible, but for our requirement, we rarely needed them.
UI is simple and clean, and the tool itself is straightforward to use.
And I must mention that the pricing of poweraddon is exceptionally lower than the competitors.

What do you dislike about PowerAddon?
Support/ helpdesk system needs improvement.
Not at all happy with the support they provide related to the product.

Recommendations to others considering PowerAddon:
Go for it as the price is very low and the features it provides are many.
I must say that it is significantly cost-effective.

What problems is PowerAddon solving and how is that benefiting you?
We choose Power addon as it was a very cost-effective solution that we used for our marketing campaigns to get an insight into customer reactions and interests every time we release a new product in the market.
The outcome was terrific - we were not only able to get real-time reports but also able to see the success rate of our campaign.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best digital marketing tool for analysis!!!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about PowerAddon?
Easier to follow up various performance analyzing areas like Campaign of product, Performance, Review, Ads. It is easier to track and monitor all the happening activities at one stretch rather than spending time on each individually.

What do you dislike about PowerAddon?
Often there seem to be discrepancies between an individual parameter that is being monitored by the same tool. For example, while I was reviewing an ad for the number of views generated, So there seems to mismatch in the tracking tool.

Recommendations to others considering PowerAddon:
One of the major analysis tool I could use while inside digital marketing field.

What problems is PowerAddon solving and how is that benefiting you?
One of the major benefits I have come across is the integration of social media campaigns, which can be integrated widely across platforms and making them versatile in nature. Manual adaptation isn't required while working on different ads same time.

initial_reviews.review_title: Simple and Best Marketing cloud Suite available
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about PowerAddon?
The best thing is the Price of the product for the Feature it offers. There are regular Updates which add new features to it.
The Ui is pretty easy to use and can be easily understood even by a new user.

What do you dislike about PowerAddon?
The Customer Support needs a lot of work, at times there are Problems which are not addressed on time which affects Business.

What problems is PowerAddon solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending amrketing Emails has now become so easy and Powerful. I can send Somewhere around 20000 to 30000 mails per week through PowerAddon now.
